categories: Category:Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II actors
Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Christopher Neame played Jerec in Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II. Most depictions of Jerec are based on his appearance. The only source that depicts Jerec as somewhat thin—at least thinner than Neame—is the New Essential Guide to Characters. NEGtC also depicts Jerec as completely bald although Neame was only partially so. He returned to Star Wars in 2011 when he provided the voices for Darth Ikoral, Ortan Cela and Hadro in Star Wars: The Old Republic.

Outside of Star Wars, Neame played in horror film Dracula A.D. 1972, as "Johnny Alucard". Neame also played a Nazi general in the two part episode "Stormfront" of Star Trek: Enterprise, and the villain Skagra in the science-fiction series Doctor Who in the unbroadcasted serial Shada. He also appeared in the 1989 Bond film License to Kill as Fallon, an agent sent to stop Bond's agenda against the drug lord Sanchez.
